amendatorysection.bookinfo: Uniform Commercial Code, Revised Statutes Cumulative Supplement, 2024
amendatorysection.catchline: Relation to article 9 and consumer laws.
amendatorysection.para: (a) If there is conflict between this article and article 9, article 9 governs.
(b) A transaction subject to this article is subject to any applicable rule of law that establishes a different rule for consumers.
